title: Mortals, Gods And A Muse
description: Mortals, Gods and a Muse is a fanciful romance that asks some wonderful what if you were Sherry Duncan, successful romance novelist with a bad case of writer's block, have decide to take you imaginary muse on a cruise--to a romantic island? And what if you meet someone who could pass for an ancient Greek god, a would-be lover who was rich, who could cook and who only had eyes for you? And what if your life suddenly became more full of intrigue and romance the lives you write about?
author: Suzette Vaughn
